name: Impala daemon prometheus endpoint up
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the check cannot access the Prometheus metrics endpoint of the Impala daemon instance.

name: Impala statestore prometheus endpoint up
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the check cannot access the Prometheus metrics endpoint of the Impala statestore instance.

name: Impala catalog prometheus endpoint up
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the check cannot access the Prometheus metrics endpoint of the Impala catalog instance.
